metadata.name: Childish Old Woman
metadata.description:
"Childish Old Woman" is an oil painting created on an antique suitcase. This artwork aims to depict the experiences and memories that this suitcase has carried throughout the years. The use of oil painting and mixed media on the surface of the suitcase reflects a tapestry of all the adventures and experiences it has encountered during its travels.

The antique suitcase itself serves as the primary canvas for the artwork, representing its timeless connection to the memories and stories it holds within. Through painting and the combination of various materials, these narratives are visually narrated.

from the 30-piece Installation Art Collection
oil paint and mixed media on suitcase
60x90 cm
2023
